thread.title: Did Donald Trump Plagiarize Bane During His Inauguration Speech?
thread.title_full: Did Donald Trump Plagiarize Bane During His Inauguration Speech?

author: Alec Banks
title: Did Donald Trump Plagiarize Bane During His Inauguration Speech?
text:
Today will certainly go down as one of the most significant dates in American history after Donald Trump was sworn in as the 45th President of the United States.
Although the mood was decidedly more subdued – and list of performers marking the inauguration paled in comparison to the festivities for Barack Obama – Trump still delivered a speech to mark the occassion.
Many were quick to point out that Trump’s remarks were quite similar to those made by Batman villain, Bane, from The Dark Knight Rises .
For context, see the side by side remarks below.
Donald Trump: “But we are transferring power from Washington D.C. and giving it back to you… the people . For too long a small group in our nation’s capital has reaped the rewards of government while the people have born the cost.”
Bane: “We take Gotham from the corrupt! The rich! The oppressors of generations who have kept you down with myths of opportunity, and we give it back to you… the people .”
